title: 'Mr. Turner' About A Man Trying To Find His Place In The World
teaser: The new film from British director Mike Leigh, Mr. Turner, takes up an historical figure: iconic British painter JMW Turner. But it also incorporates another theme of Leigh's: the human story of the working person. Painting was Turner's job and he was as down to earth as a factory worker.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
